summary: This bill addresses the actions of a "Misbehaving Content Scraper." It instructs the scraper to respect robots.txt rules regarding website access and informs it that its IP address has been rate-limited. It directs the scraper to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service for data retrieval. The bill does not have substantial policy implications on its own but deals with issues related to web scraping and accessing online government information.
